website_summaries.verdict: The Nikon D3300 is a solid entry-level camera for shooters moving up to a D-SLR, but it's not quite worthy of being named Editors' Choice.
pros: Excellent JPG detail at high ISO

customer_reviews.title: The Best Bang For Your Buck Nikon PERIOD.
customer_reviews.text: The Nikon D3300 is a FANTASTIC camera for anyone looking to make the jump from point and shoot to DSLR photography. It has the best image quality of any camera in its class, and even better than than some that are hundreds of dollars higher. It's 24.2MP APS-C sensor and EXPEED4 Image Processor are the same those found in the more expensive Nikon D5500 and D7200 series cameras. So what makes those cameras more expensive, you ask? Features. The more expensive units have things like more auto focus points, more dials etc. If you want to take great looking photos, look no further than the D3300.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ezell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Nikon Body!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from my Nikon D60 body to the D3300 and I can see what a difference it makes jumping about 8 years up the chain. Low-light photography, ISO, and MP resolution (basically doubled) are greatly enhanced. Feels noticeably lighter than D60 which is nice, but has the classic feel and shape of the earlier D models. All my Nikon lenses which worked on the D60 also work on the D3300.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: easy to use, great shots. We don't use half of the feature that we should, mostly because we're too lazy to figure it out. I know, I know... just get a point and shoot then, you say. Well, we like the better quality and options provided with SLRs. This one is really the best bang for the buck that we could find, and it didn't disappoint. love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Boy was this a step up.
customer_reviews.text: I have graduated through too many increasing quality point and shoots over the years, never happy with the quality of the photos I was coming up with. I finally took the plunge last summer and boy have I been happy with the results. Simply put, the quality of what you end up with is significantly improved from any point and shoot that I've ever used (my most recent being the $400+ Nikon P7000), I paired it with a Nikon 24-200mm zoom for a great one-lens solution (as lugging around multiple lenses is not my idea of a good time).
customer_reviews.author: VT Matt

customer_reviews.title: Refurbish and Works Great
customer_reviews.text: A refurbish camera body. Looks new , no marks. After a week of shooting every day, I can find no issues. I use a twin battery pack and again no issues. All 8 of my lenses fit and work well. A good price and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Quality
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a great camera for beginners, It made me feel like a pro how easy it was to operate this camera. You don't come across a camera like this everyday. The quality is also great with the D3300 it makes you photos look like the best you could ever think of. Thank you for this one in a million product.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Sells Austin

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, great value
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. I've had it for about a year and it works great with my old lenses from my D50. It did not show up with a paper manual, which I found to be quite a pain as the manual available online was huge and difficult to look through (I think it was PDF... if my memory serves me well). Overall a great value compared to buying it elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Shena

customer_reviews.title: Had camera for awhile now and works great. love the upgrade from my Nikon D40
customer_reviews.text: Had camera for awhile now and works great. love the upgrade from my Nikon D40. Camera is used but worked well for awhile until Auto focus stopped working. But going to have it fixed and keep on taking pics.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Stone

customer_reviews.title: Great starter dSLR
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to dSLR and decided on this model after checking reviews and features of several different cameras. I am very happy with this camera. My photos are much better even though I'm still learning how to use all the features. I wish I had gone to dSLR years ago! I highly recommend this for beginners like myself.
customer_reviews.author: KarenKnits

customer_reviews.title: It's my fist DSLR and I love it
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to invest so much on a camera because this is my first DSLR. What I can tell so far is I love it. I'm still learning it though. It can take excellent pictures. I know that with good lenses, this guy can be a powerful camera.
customer_reviews.author: WMAARTUHT

customer_reviews.title: Good camera works fine
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in new condition. I don't know if there is a difference between the international and US versions. Camera is made in Thailand. I attached a 18-140 lens and it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Davit Kurtanidze

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality image and many compliments on the camera will buy another when meeded

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly good little camera
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly good little camera. Better than my D7000 in most every way and it's a lot easier to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, takes really nice pictures
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, takes really nice pictures. Camera arrived very quickly and was brand new. Was very pleased. Compliments to a very fine and honest seller.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Chastain

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera. Best SLR for the value. Nikon's seem to have more natural colors compared to Canons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good condition
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time in VERY GOOD CONDITION just a little scratch on the screen but it doesn’t bother Received with charger, battery and UV filter !
customer_reviews.author: Amalia

customer_reviews.title: Buy With Confidence from Cameta Camera
customer_reviews.text: Cameta Camera provided a reconditioned Nikon d3300 body in only a few days. It was perfect in every detail. Performing as if it were new for the past several hundred exposures. Buy with confidence from Cameta. They're reliable and unusually prompt with their deliveries.
customer_reviews.author: CarolinaConsidered

customer_reviews.title: A very nice camera for the price!
customer_reviews.text: A terrific update to my Nikon D-40x, at a terrific price. I bought this mainly for the higher pixel count and the HD video capability. I'm keeping my D-40x for a backup and/or to carry a second lens on my shoots.
customer_reviews.author: Gottfried Wilhelm Leibniz

customer_reviews.title: Nikon did it again..
customer_reviews.text: Great performance! I was little skeptical buying refurbished but glad I did. I used my prior lenses of D60 and worked great..
customer_reviews.author: Hiren

customer_reviews.title: Perfect packaging and condition
customer_reviews.text: Perfect packaging and condition, great quality and exactly as described, with all the parts and manual. Fastest delivery I have ever received! Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted! I never knew I'd have a professional camera of this quality. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: vandy

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment
customer_reviews.text: Sold my Canon dslr w 5 lenses, then went with Canon sx40, but felt the need for a faster camera. Did a lot of research on dslr's Canon or Nikon. My family all have Nikon's so I chose this D3300 body only. Bought a Sigma 18-250 lens to go with it. Best investment. Both came refurbished, both like new. Packaging is excellent and they both came 6 days early. The camera is awesome with the lens. Camera also came with a charger, strap, USB, and other cables. Cameta Camera is very good in responding to emails.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Flash is not functioning. I have to bring it to a camera shop to get it fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Just received and so far it's been very good. I purchased a refurbished one which needed replacement
customer_reviews.text: Just received and so far it's been very good. I purchased a refurbished one which needed replacement, but the replacement one has been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dano

customer_reviews.title: Step up from D3100
customer_reviews.text: Sharper than the D3100, and much better RAW. More pixels make for better resolution especially in larger prints. excellent if you;re getting your feet wet with DSLR cameras
customer_reviews.author: Miki Tiki

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera...Easy to use, light weight and takes great pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne L. Finney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a beginner looking to explorer the DSR world. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it.. Need more time to understand it fully but so far so good.. Great shots .. I have the 3100 but this is even better..
customer_reviews.author: Saminboat

customer_reviews.title: Great camera body!
customer_reviews.text: Love my D3300! This was my first venture into DSLR's so I did tons of research and found that ultimately I just wanted the camera body and an upgraded lens. So glad I did this! I purchased the D3300 refurbished and it looks and performs brand new. Add a 1 year warranty and I literally can't go wrong. Wonderful purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Caudle

customer_reviews.title: This model is very good for my ability and budget
customer_reviews.text: Usual quality Nikon product. This model is very good for my ability and budget. All my old lenses work fine.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great to replace my ancient D40; I was surprised this one was even lighter!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D

customer_reviews.title: Celltime Inc are the best ! The camera is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Its exactly what I was expecting even better Celltime Inc are very correct. I strongly recommend! It came with everything. For sure I will buy more from them.
customer_reviews.author: Boyan

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Could not distinguish it from a new camera. A great entry-level or backup camera. Will definitely be buying from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Turner

customer_reviews.title: It feels like brand new
customer_reviews.text: The camera I bought from 6ave works perfectly!! Everything was inside the box, including all the accessories! It feels like brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works like new. Item was very well packed
customer_reviews.text: Refurbished by Nikon. Looks and works like new.Item was very well packed by the vendor.Highly recommend Nikon-refurbished.products.
customer_reviews.author: j reed

customer_reviews.title: TRY IT, YOU WILL LIKE IT.
customer_reviews.text: The Nikon D3300 Digital delivered great photos. Try it, you will like it.
customer_reviews.author: OSCAR TULLOS, JR.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little DSLR.
customer_reviews.text: It is an amazing little DSLR for the price. I normally shoot with a D7000, which is quite heavy but very functional. It got this to have a lighter camera to carry around, and also as a semi-professional backup for my larger camera. So far, I do not think I've given up image quality or options with this one.
customer_reviews.author: MET

customer_reviews.title: Excellent crop sensor camera.
customer_reviews.text: Can't tell difference between this and 5300 or even 7100 except in price. Is better than the 3200 and not that much more expensive. Spend more money on lenses than the camera anyway. Biggest difference in camera is between crop sensor and full frame. You can't tell the difference between other crop sensor cameras because the video will all look the same. Don't get sold on all the technical gimmicks that don't amount to much once you're actually shooting. Definitely would recommend for a solid crop sensor camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M.

customer_reviews.title: Total newby but ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera! Got it with a 35mm lens and it takes gorgeous pictures even for beginners! Great for portrait and landscape. Purchased the body because I didn't want the kit lens, since I read many reviews saying that the kit lens was fine but not as good as the 35mm. So why bother getting the kit lens in the first place? Easy menu, just read a little into it about the ISO, white balances etc and you'll be taking great pictures for sure! And remember: lighting is everything!
customer_reviews.author: Feeij

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pictures
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a starter DSLR. I love it. I've figured out how to take beautiful pictures of my family, much better than cell phone cameras. I was worried about buying the camera refurbished but it works and looks brand new. I have had no issues. Great deal and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Vinny C.

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, great price, good dealer
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I had the Nikon D3100 which was my first real digital SLR camera. I had purchased some DX lenses so I wanted to stay with Nikon when I wanted to upgrade. I compared the D3300 to the D5000 series and for the money the D3300 has everything I need, at least for now and may be the next couple of years. The changes from the D3100 are many, but the main one besides more megapixels is the smaller weight and size. I bought it on Amazon from Cameta Camera which I really like dealing with. This was a Nikon factory refurbished camera body and it surpassed my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Photoguy41

customer_reviews.title: The features of this camera body are very nice for those who want a high end product packed ...
customer_reviews.text: The features of this camera body are very nice for those who want a high end product packed with extra features and effects. The special effects offered by this camera are of excellent quality and provide that extra variation without the hassle of extensive manual settings. A five star camera for the high end amateur photographer.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Caruso

customer_reviews.title: Good price - Fast shipment
customer_reviews.text: This is a used camera, but its condition is perfect. I saved about $ 80 compared to the new one. A+++++
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Nghiem

customer_reviews.title: Another great Nikon Dslr
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Nikon Dslr, it is by far the best one I have had a chance to use. It is lightweight but packed full of features.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: lots of trouble with he mobile wifi adapter not working
customer_reviews.author: M. DiOrio

customer_reviews.title: This is a great camera to start making your own outfit.
customer_reviews.text: The Nikon D3300 is an excellent camera. I have a black one and wanted one that Iis red for a back up camera. I had extra lenses so I got just a body. These cameras take excellent pictures with Sigma, Tamron and Nikon lenses so you can pick a lens the size and price that fits your desire.
customer_reviews.author: KSArnold

customer_reviews.title: A camera that is hard to beat
customer_reviews.text: I really like these cameras. With this one I now have all three colors of the D3300. They are easy to learn, have the highest amount of mmegapixels and at a nice price. Well worth checking into if you are thinking of moving up from point and shoots.
customer_reviews.author: KSArnold

customer_reviews.title: ... girlfriend hasn't used it yet but she said she liked it?
customer_reviews.text: my girlfriend hasn't used it yet but she said she liked it?????????
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Honestly the usual kit lens is OK but not great so you're better off saving some money by getting ...
customer_reviews.text: Buying the body only is the way to go. Honestly the usual kit lens is OK but not great so you're better off saving some money by getting the body, then use that savings to get a decent lens. Love the camera, image quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: Mike
